remarks: Product of group multiples, generalized to ` ZZ ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgass.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgass $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) ) -> ( ( M x. N ) .x. X ) = ( M .x. ( N .x. X ) ) ) $.
